org.locationtech.jts.awt

Interface PointShapeFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PointShapeFactory.BasePointShapeFactory, PointShapeFactory.Circle, PointShapeFactory.Cross, PointShapeFactory.Point, PointShapeFactory.Square, PointShapeFactory.Star, PointShapeFactory.Triangle, PointShapeFactory.X

    public interface PointShapeFactory
    An interface for classes which create Shapes to represent PointShapeFactory.Point geometries. Java2D does not provide an actual point shape, so some other shape must be used to render points (e.g. such as a Rectangle or Ellipse).
    Author:
    Martin Davis
